thread.title: Providence celebrates new childcare facility | Local | the-messenger.com
thread.title_full: Providence celebrates new childcare facility | Local | the-messenger.com

author: David R, Drennan For The Journal-Enterprise
title: Providence celebrates new childcare facility | Local | the-messenger.com
text:
On Monday, September 15, a large gathering of parents, children and community members gathered at 606 First Street in Providence to celebrate the grand opening of the Webco Learning Center. Free hot dogs, inflatables and face painting welcomed potential students and their parents, and tours of the new facility were given by staff members. The facility, parking lot and street were a hubbub of excitement.
Providence celebrates new childcare facility
- By David R, Drennan For The Journal-Enterprise
